title: 【解密】BREAKING IN|破门而入|解密地图|1.11.2|NOAHSTERNP
author: Xiao_Tao_Zi
txt_content:
本帖最后由 像素君 于 2017-8-7 22:29 编辑 

简介 Description*Warning: this map is rage inducingUsing your tools and surroundings, you need to figure out a way to break into five different building without setting of any cameras.Tiptoe away across the room as you try to steal many different items like a prisoners diary or a kings crown.Currently five differently levels you can break into buildings ranging from a simple house to an art gallery.In this frustrating map, you will have to combine your parkour and puzzle solving skills to make it home.Map play time: around 20 minutes.
*注意：这张地图会令你发狂使用你周围的工具，你需要摸出一条到五个建筑物里并且不被摄像头发现的路。垫着脚到不同的房间来偷一些不同的物品，比如犯罪分子的日记或王冠。目前有5个关卡，从一个简单的屋子到一个艺术展览。在这个令人发狂的地图里，你需要结合你的跑酷和解密技巧来回家。游玩时间：大概20分钟


规则 RulesPlay in 1.11.2.This is designed for one player but can support more if you want your friends to play too.You can cheat and during some levels you may need to.If recording for YT, give me credit for building map.

1.11.2游玩这是为了1个玩家而设计的地图，但是如果你要多人的话其实也可以。你可以作弊，如果你真的需要的话你如果在Youtube录视频，那请给我一点支持。


图片 Pictures
